text: bananas and Africa have a significant relationship when it comes to Banana production the cultivation process in Africa is fascinating as it integrates traditional farming techniques with meticulous care and a deep connection to the land quality banana production begins with planting a banana seedling known as a sucker rather than from seeds these suckers Sprout from the base of an existing banana plant we're about to delve into the African jungle to explore how these large clusters of bananas are cultivated and harvested stick around it's going to be exciting Farmers regularly remove weeds that compete with banana plants for nutrients and water but they also ensure that the plants receive ample water through irrigation systems a new airspring technology has been particularly helpful in this regard as bananas grow Farmers monitor the closely until they reach the ideal stage for wrapping to protect them from pesticides and ensure proper growth once bananas reach their optimal size experts carefully Harvest them using sharp knives or machetes each Bunch can weigh up to 40 kg so harvesting is usually a team effort to avoid damage during Transportation special methods are employed to transport these delicate fruits without bruising or contamination banana chips are beloved worldwide for their crunchy texture and sweet flavor if you're interested in how your favorite snacks are made you're in the right place bananas are typically harvested while still green so they're firm enough for processing at the factory they undergo thorough cleaning before being sliced and fried into crispy chips beyond their Delicious Fruit almost every part of the banana plant is useful banana leaves serve as natural plates or wrappers in many cultures due to their sturdiness and subtle flavor addition strawberries also play a crucial role in various culinary Delights from short cakes to Tarts and cheesecakes thanks to their natural sweetness which often requires minimal added sugar while traditionally handpicked due to their delicate nature new robotic technology has emerged for harvesting ripe strawberries efficiently in modern factories strawberries undergo multiple cleaning stages before being processed into various products like canned or frozen strawberries or strawberry jam all while maintaining strict hygiene standards through minimal human contact pineapples follow an equally intriguing Journey from Farm to Table Farmers cover pineapple seed beds with special sheets that retain soil moisture and control temperature by reducing evaporation a critical step especially in dry regions [Music] once pineapples mature they're tested for ripeness using refractometers before being harvested carefully due to their spiky leaves Modern Machinery AIDS Farmers by transporting heavy pineapples directly from Fields without manual labor strain in processing units pineapples go through rigorous washing before being sorted by weight for balanced packaging some pineapples are further processed into peeled chunks or fresh juice using Advanced Machinery ensuring no part goes wasted from peels used elsewhere down even pulp separation during juicing processes finally packaged fresh juice bottles get sealed tightly preserving tropical goodness ready anytime you crave it canned juices undergo similar meticulous processes ensuring freshness and flavor intact upon opening each can whether it's bananas turned into chips strawberries transformed across different states or pineapples Juiced and canned the seamless integration between traditional practices and modern Technologies ensures top-notch quality and sustainability throughout these agricultural Marvels [Music]
